transform: <xsl:stylesheet version="3.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:fn="http://www.w3.org/2005/02/xpath-functions"><xsl:output method="text" indent="yes" encoding="utf-8"/><xsl:template match="/">{ <xsl:if test="/node()/search/search-result-total"> "Count": <xsl:value-of select="/node()/search/search-result-total"/>, </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/node()/search/search-results/search-result">"Documents" : [<xsl:for-each select="/node()/search/search-results/search-result">{ "Title": "<xsl:value-of select="translate(./document-title, '\"', '')" />", "webURL" : "<xsl:for-each select="./document-url-list/document-url"><xsl:value-of select="./@url" /></xsl:for-each>", "Type": "<xsl:value-of select="./document-content-type" />",  "CreationDate": "<xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='court-date-display']"><xsl:value-of select="./text()" /></xsl:for-each><xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='added']"><xsl:value-of select="./md.primarycite/text()" /></xsl:for-each>", "Snippet": "<xsl:if test='./document-abstract/value[@name="subject"]'> | subject: <xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='subject']"><xsl:value-of select="translate(./text(),'\"','')" /></xsl:for-each></xsl:if><xsl:if test='./document-abstract/value[@name="keywords"]'> | keywords: <xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='keywords']"><xsl:value-of select="translate(./text(),'\"','')" /></xsl:for-each></xsl:if><xsl:if test='./document-abstract/value[@name="court-display"]'> | court-display: <xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='court-display']"><xsl:value-of select="translate(./text(),'\"','')" /></xsl:for-each></xsl:if><xsl:if test='./document-abstract/value[@name="court-date-display"]'> | court-date-display: <xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='court-date-display']"><xsl:value-of select="translate(./text(),'\"','')" /></xsl:for-each></xsl:if><xsl:if test='./document-abstract/value[@name="chapter-title"]'> | chapter-title: <xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='chapter-title']"><xsl:value-of select="translate(./text(),'\"','')" /></xsl:for-each></xsl:if><xsl:if test='./document-abstract/value[@name="citation"]/md.primarycite'> | citation: <xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='citation']/md.primarycite"><xsl:value-of select="translate(./text(),'\"','')" /></xsl:for-each></xsl:if><xsl:if test='./document-abstract/value[@name="sub-heading-1"]/heading'> | sub-heading-1: <xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='sub-heading-1']/heading"><xsl:value-of select="translate(./text(),'\"','')" /></xsl:for-each></xsl:if>", "AdditionalProperties": { "court-display": "<xsl:value-of select="./document-abstract/value[@name='court-display']" />" }}<xsl:if test="position() != last()">,</xsl:if></xsl:for-each>]</xsl:if> }</xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>
